Posts.Content: Dear Sue I am sorry you are having such a hard time but there are always people on here to talk to and listen to you when you need that help and comfort....we are all there for each other so please don't feel alone...hugs to you at this time Sarah x x
Posts.Title: life sucks

Posts.Content: Hey Janet I was tired which made me shake doing the first treatment as I had wound myself up as to how the machine would work!! Try and relax and use the creams given too. I have used the cream religiously and touchwood have not got a burn from the treatment. Try and rest as much as you can before and after treatment and this will help you chill out. Take care Sarah x
Posts.Title: First radiotherapy treatment

Posts.Content: I also have been having trouble sleeping. I started Tamoxifen wsith my Radiotherapy.....I have done four weeks of treatment and I am at my wits end re lack of sleep....I only have four more treatments so the end is in sight!!....I am trying Kalms tonight for the first time and hope it helps.....very low and teary too....not depressed I don't think just knackered and tired of treatments....... Hugs to all and hope you sleep better tonight. Take care Sarah x
